title: Mac Client Problems HEELLLP
body:
so i closed my lol client one time and then the next time i tried to open it it said unexpected error occured so i then found a way to open it with userkernell launcher which worked twice then it stopped and started saying unexpected error occured again so i emptied every single file i have for lol in the trach and cleared it out, now i tried to redwonload and reinstall but i click on lol and nothing happens

PLEASEEE HELP

replies.body: i still cant figure it out i tried using my girlfriends mac too and it said the same thing
